alert.note: Alert for Brule (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 05 at 12:58AM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CHARLES MIX...NORTHWESTERN GREGORY AND SOUTHWESTERN BRULE COUNTIES... At 158 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Burke, or 30 miles east of Winner, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Charles Mix, northwestern Gregory and southwestern Brule Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
